name: Tronje
body:
## Things I know
* C (MPI, OpenMP, POSIX-Threads)
* C++
* OpenGL
* Python

## Tools I like
* make
* cmake
* git
* gdb
* valgrind

## Things I like having on my system
* Archlinux
* zsh
* GNOME (I know, I know...)

## Things I do in my freetime
* code
* video games
* weightlifting
